title: My 3rd promo win didn't register in system D:
body: I tried re logging but nothing changed..

replies.body:
Did you dodge during your promo series? If you did, it would have counted as a loss in your series and should be factored into your matches for the promos. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
No dodge, I wish I got a screen shot. End game lobby showed 1 win check and the game that just finished I loss mark, which is impossible because I won my last match.
Can you send me a link to the match that you won before checking your wins/losses for the series?

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2297497778/215567410
I don't understand why i'm getting these lobby crashes.

Did these lobby crashes happen during your promo series? If so, that would be why you are missing a win. A disconnection is recorded as a *dodge* by the server, and *dodges* during a promo series counts as a loss.
sorry for late responses, yea the crash happened in promos

I took a look at your account just to be sure and it does look like that's exactly what happened. Your crash during your promos caused a *dodge* which instantly became a loss. If you can recall the error or behavior that happened when that crash occurred, I can suggest steps to take in order to prevent this from happening in the future.
